You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
OMNISTUDIO DOCUMENT GENERATION
Omnistudio Document Generation

You can generate documents from Microsoft Word (.docx) and Microsoft PowerPoint (.pptx) templates. These templates can include values from any JSON-based data in the text, including data from any Salesforce object. You can optionally convert the resulting documents to PDF format.

With Omnistudio Document Generation, you can generate contracts, proposals, quotes, reports, non-disclosure agreements, service agreements, and so on.

You can generate documents using provided sample client-side or server-side Omniscripts. You can also create your own Omniscripts, Integration Procedures, or Apex classes to generate documents.

Client-side document generation is a synchronous process that results in a downloadable preview of the Generated Document. Server-side document generation is an asynchronous process best for large and rendering-heavy documents. Although server-side document generation is performed on Hyperforce, the resulting Generated Document is stored in your Salesforce org, attached to the object for which it's generated.

Client-Side document generation supports Customer Community Plus, Customer Community, and Partner Community users to generate documents using client-side Omniscripts. The client-side Omniscripts are fndSingleDocxLwc, fndMultiDocxLwc, and fndmultiPDFConvertLwc.

Server-Side document generation supports Customer Community Plus, Customer Community, and Partner Community users to generate documents using server-side Omniscripts. The server-side Omniscript is fndSingleDocxServersideLwc.

With the right licenses, Omnistudio Document Generation is available in the Omnistudio package. Unlike the objects underlying document generation in Vlocity Contract Lifecycle Management, the objects underlying this feature are part of the Salesforce core.

NOTE The Document Template Clause object has been renamed as Document Clause; therefore, going forward you won't be able to create any record using DocGen licenses.
Pre-requisite

Install the Omnistudio managed package to use Omnistudio Document Generation licenses.

Get the relevant Document Generation licenses added to Salesforce by a Salesforce Administrator. Contact your Salesforce Account Executive if you don’t have the document generation licenses. To obtain the licenses, you have to accept additional license terms and conditions.

Prepare to Install the Omnistudio Package.

Install or Upgrade the Omnistudio Package.

Omnistudio Document Generation Release Notes
Review the new and enhanced features for Omnistudio Document Generation.
Post Install Steps for Omnistudio Document Generation
After you install a new release of the Omnistudio Package, you must complete post-install steps for Omnistudio Document Generation.
Post Upgrade Steps for Omnistudio Document Generation
After you upgrade to a new release of the Omnistudio Package, you must complete post-upgrade steps for Omnistudio Document Generation.
Considerations for Using Omnistudio Document Generation with Omnistudio Standard
Before exporting document templates, use a JSON editor to update the Data Mapper name in the file to adhere to the Omnistudio component naming conventions (no spaces or special characters allowed). Then import the document template file.
Permission Set Licenses for Omnistudio Document Generation
Permission set licenses give users incremental access to features that aren't included in their user licenses. Users can be assigned any number of permission set licenses.
Omnistudio Package and Salesforce Industries Package
You can now install both the Omnistudio package and Salesforce Industry package in the same org. If you install the Omnistudio package first, this dual installation feature lets you choose the required document generation capabilities. With enhanced document generation capabilities, you get seamless guided workflows to design templates and generate documents.
Omnistudio Document Generation Differences from CLM and Limitations
Omnistudio Document Generation has differences from document generation in Vlocity Contract Lifecycle Management and other size and processing limitations.
Client-Side and Server-Side Omnistudio Document Generation Compared
Client-Side document generation is better for some use cases, and Server-Side document generation is better for others. A table summarizes the factors to consider.
Omnistudio Client-Side Document Generation
Client-Side document generation is a synchronous process that results in a downloadable preview of the generated documents. You can generate documents from Microsoft Word (.docx), and Microsoft PowerPoint (.pptx) templates. These templates can include values from any JSON-based data in the text, including data from any Salesforce object. You can optionally convert the resulting documents to .pdf format.
Omnistudio Server-Side Document Generation
Server-Side document generation is available in both the Omnistudio and Salesforce Industries packages. Server-Side document generation is an asynchronous process that's built to handle the rendering of large and heavy documents and for generating documents in batches. The Server-Side document generation service is secure and scalable and is hosted on Salesforce Hyperforce. The generated document is stored in your Salesforce org and is attached to the object for which it's generated.
Omnistudio Document Generation Document Templates
A document template defines the structure, content, and format of generated documents. You do most of your document authoring when you create templates. You can create Microsoft Word or Microsoft PowerPoint documents that contain formatted text, including tables, paragraphs, columns, and images. These documents can also be converted to PDF format.
Set Up Omnistudio Document Generation Customer Community Plus User
Perform these tasks to set up the customer community plus (digital experience) user in Omnistudio for document generation.
Set Up Omnistudio Document Generation Customer Community User
Perform these tasks to set up the customer community (digital experience) user in Omnistudio for document generation.
Set Up Omnistudio Document Generation Partner Community User
Perform these tasks to set up the partner (digital experience) user in Omnistudio for document generation.
Metering and Throttling
Metering measures resource utilization levels and throttling controls resource access and use based on defined rules.

Tips for troubleshooting user access and permissions related to Omnistudio Document Generation.
